attributes.action: give equal rights to fathers which have the wellbeing of their child in mind whilst protecting them from their abusive mothers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: having experienced, and still experiencing the difficulties one has to go through as a father to protect his child from an abusive mother, due to favouritism of women as a natural child carers. i had no other choice, but to take my son to the police after i've noticed severe bruising on him by the hands of his mother, he was then taken into care! now i find myself being persecuted by the child social services and other attached agencies! there are sensible male parents out there, and in situations like these we do not get the support we need! on the contrary, it is being made extremely difficult for men to maintain a normal relationship with the child! the different agencies are having forced adoption in mind after the court process, in order to keep the child in the system; rather than returning it back into the loving care of its father!
